reviewText: People always want to improve their visual or auditory reflexes, but frequently forget tactile. This DVD covers that oft-forgotten topic. The second link in this four-part chain, Sammy provides drills you can do with your training partner in your own home to improve your reaction time to changes in feeling. Having good tactile reflexes is especially important if a fight goes to the ground, where we are most vulnerable. Give yourself the edge in a fight by improving this type of reflex. Make sure to get the other three videos in this four-part series, as well!
